one.name: Self-Hosted Cloud Storage
one.value: My dissertation was a self-hosted cloud storage solution, packaged into a single .exe file. Receiving a high 1st. Built using Python, Web Dev, SQLite, ReactJS and Bootstrap.

one.name: .NET CRM System
one.value: This was a CRM system to handle customer data alongside the built-in Work Managment Systems that allow teams to organise and complete projects effectively. Languages used: C# and Microsoft SQL.

one.name: UniMaps
one.value: My first project at University, a website to direct people accross multiple NTU campuses. Based on campus building names. Languages used: PHP, Web Dev, Python & JSON.

one.name: Safe Routes Android App
one.value: Dissertation for my masters degree, designed to guide people home based on crime statistics and create safe travel groups. Languages used: Java/Kotlin, SQL, JSON.

one.name: E-Commerce Technology Site
one.value: The site was created as a e-commerce site, with mock payment methods, purchase return functionality and customer support chatbot. Using: PHP, Pyhton, Web Dev and SQL.

two.name: Run Fatigue Tracker
two.value: I liked Garmins muscle fatigue tracker, didn't like their watches, so made my own, soon to be a web app too. Languages: React, SQLite. Might try to make a watch app soon too.

two.name: APIs Stored In Azure
two.value: Most of my personal projects use APIs stored in Microsoft Azure, as I usually attempt to make websites and phone applications.

two.name: Chore Planner :(
two.value: Living with house mates ain't easy. This site using PHP, SQL and a well designed UI, was my attempt to not be the only one washing plates and forks.

two.name: Budget Site
two.value: (Insert Mr. Krabs Meme) Site built in PHP, Web Dev and SQL, to plan weekly and monthly finances, as of May 2023 it's in need of a UI upgrade.

three.name: Notts Police Graduate
three.value: A brilliant scheme that allowed me to get valuable experience in all departments. Solutions & Development, Operations, Networks and Support. Before focusing on a one department to develop my skills in.
